text: William Edward Hickey (September 19, 1927 â€“ June 29, 1997) was an American actor. He is best known for his Oscar-nominated role as Don Corrado Prizzi in the John Huston 1985 movie Prizzi's Honor, as well as Uncle Lewis in National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation (1989) and the voice of Dr. Finklestein in Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas (1993). Hickey died of emphysema and bronchitis in New York City, aged 69. title: William Hickey
